website_summaries.verdict: This fast-acting hair removal cream from a trusted brand removes hair while also moisturizing your skin – and it comes in a pack of three.
pros: Pump bottle makes it easy to dispense the perfect amount of hair removal cream without any excess
Formula acts quickly without irritating or damaging the skin underneath
Helps to moisturize and heal damaged, dehydrated skin
cons: Pump bottle can leak while traveling in a suitcase or bag

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but don't leave it on too long!!!
customer_reviews.text: When they say to not leave it on too long, you gahtdamn well listen to them. It works great, but starts to burn after 8 minutes. Leaves everything clean and smooth for weeks. Be careful around your bung & taint.
customer_reviews.author: Scot

customer_reviews.title: Product is Ok
customer_reviews.text: I looked every where to find this product in stores (I could only find the version for women). So I purchased on Amazon. To be honest I have tried the one that is designed for women and did not get any different result than I did with the one for men. I like it but will not be buying it again because the female version was cheaper and easier to find locally. I suggest trying both and choosing which works best for you.
customer_reviews.author: TGR

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hairy guy (like a lot) and this cream definitely works on me. More than 2 years using it and I’m not planning to switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Straight for the price and works really well. I use it for sensitive regions and it doesn't disappoint. Note to anyone who is going to use this don't leave it on too long you will get chemical burns
customer_reviews.author: Shawn E.

customer_reviews.title: Not just for men...
customer_reviews.text: Dunno how I feel about this. It works but is time consuming and only lasts a couple days longer than shaving. I can’t combine it with my shower cause it’s gotta sit, so I have to take time before hand to lube it on and air guitar to AC/DC before I can rinse it off and actually shower... If it was permanent, I’d wear it for days
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh great value for the package I baught
customer_reviews.text: I mean for temo hair removal it’s good but same tike it grows back quick I use it for my pubs
customer_reviews.author: Lil corona

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Received 1 product for a (pack of 3). Completely unsatisfied with the order.
customer_reviews.author: George Lindholm

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hairy back and that's where I use it and it works good. Just follow the instructions. I give it four stars only because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: ramair

customer_reviews.title: love the procut much smoother then shaving alone but only ...
customer_reviews.text: love the procut much smoother then shaving alone but only last about a week before stubble come back but stil decent
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Follow the very simple directions and you'll be very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. I tried it for the first time today and was a little skeptical about how well it would work. Follow the very simple directions and you'll be very happy with the results, like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G Humble

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is fine. Item was advertised as a 3 pack, only one received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: it works but for my bf who is hairy u have to leave it longer and make sure u put a thick layer. could be a bit better. sometimes he has to shower twice to get rid of it all and scrub to get all the hairs off.
customer_reviews.author: zayi

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy. Works great does what is supposed to...
customer_reviews.author: Greg Pospisil

customer_reviews.title: Not a three pack.
customer_reviews.text: Item was advertised as a three pack but I only received one.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and does just what it says. Just watch out for those sensitive skin areas.
customer_reviews.author: T-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works good , but watch the time. can sting if too long, but done right its OK
customer_reviews.author: Philip O.

customer_reviews.title: Only received one bottle?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pack of three but only received one bottle. I’m a hairy man, one bottle will not do.
customer_reviews.author: JMDrap

customer_reviews.title: Do not use!!!
customer_reviews.text: It burned my skin and caused very bad skin irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Arceneaux

customer_reviews.title: It's good after you figure out how long to leave on and how hard you have to rub.
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you leave on about 15 minutes and rub off the hair with strong strokes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great, one should be careful about sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Works great, one should be careful about sensitive skin. Had skin burns for accidentally applying to a sensitive area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service!
customer_reviews.text: This order arrived in a very timely manner, on the early end of the estimated delivery window and exactly as expected. It works splendidly, too!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Does what it advertises
customer_reviews.text: I did have a break out from this. However, all of our bodies will react differently to different chemicals and such. This product would be a 5 star if the smell was better. Smells terrible. It does get the job done and leaves you with a smooth, hairless body. Unfortunately I will not be able to use again do to my reaction. I encourage anyone who buys this product to do a test with a little bit of product before applying a lot to your skin. Also the company advises that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: 123 hair removal
customer_reviews.text: Great product for hair removal, fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Enia

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!?!?!?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: got 2nd-degree burn in just 4 min of use on my back. Don't buy this unless you want to burn yourself.
customer_reviews.author: K Ogan

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully, I no longer have to shave his back
customer_reviews.text: Works well on hubby's back but he always waits too long before use. No problems with reactions or burning, etc. Effective
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just buy women's products
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried one of these creams before and this isn't a good starting point. Make sure to test the cream in small patches all over your body and wait for irritation before using it on large areas ;P
customer_reviews.author: blakehays

customer_reviews.title: Removes thick hair too!
customer_reviews.text: Removes my thick body hair. Smells good. A little harsh on the skin so expect to feel some discomfort. The key is not to let it sit on your skin and also don’t rub it. Lightly tap the product on the hairy area.
customer_reviews.author: Areen S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last or work as good if you just wash it away
customer_reviews.text: Works on my junk but starts to burn the sack if left on 7-10 min. Can’t blame it tho. Says not for the genitals. Use a wash cloth to wipe away. Doesn’t last or work as good if you just wash it away.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I Don’t Care for Nair
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this stuff!!! After using the product for several months (following the directions letter for letter), the product began to irritate and burn my skin. The burns became worse each time. I discontinued use for 3 months and tried again. More burns.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: No More Hair
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's supposed to do. Apply it to the area where you have unwanted hair, wait a few minutes and wash it off. Been using this for a while now and don't have any complaints. I haven't had any skin irritation or other skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: if you get ingrown hairs from waxing then this may be an alternative solution for you. you will be just as smooth, but it won't last as long as with waxing. no ingrown hairs, though.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware *******
customer_reviews.text: this product was awful,, complete rash,, full skin irritation, and.. ....this often says ...its not returnable.. don't buy it. I have had the rash now for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Big Homie

customer_reviews.title: Re-order
customer_reviews.text: Removed hair as described. I leave it on for10 minutes for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works good, stronger than others so don't leave it on too long.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've got thick hair and it works like a champ on it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan kennedy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Does exactly what you want it to!
customer_reviews.author: Carston Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works, don't leave it on for more that 10 min
customer_reviews.author: phil hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of hair and makes you smoooooooooth
customer_reviews.text: I wish the directions were a bit more clear. Don't take the warnings to heart, you're not gonna burn if you leave it on for 10 minutes and 1 second. Sometimes I've used it and after a bit I go in the shower and most of the hair falls off and I am smooth, but sometimes I put it on, and maybe not enough or didn't rub it in enough, and barely any comes out. I'd say apply a decent amount, sort of rub it in, then wait 15 minutes. It is very good when it does work though.
customer_reviews.author: College Dood

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and without any pain or burning sensations
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my "no-no" area and it works wonderfully. No burn, not a terrible smell (though there is some odor), and it doesn't burn afterwards as long as you use some kind of moisturizing lotion which is expected. Highly recommend this product and I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daniel Spratlin

customer_reviews.title: does not work but the one bought at Walgreens always works
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. I have been using it for well over 9 years (purchased from Walgreens) and when I saw it cheaper on Amazon I decided to save money on something I consistently use but this product barely removed any hair. I tried all three bottles in different sections and it provides a very spotty hair removal experience. Waste of money. I will pay more in Walgreens but get consistently removal of hair. I wonder if it is defective items that are being sold through Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: ejs

product_meta.title: Nair For Men Hair Removal Body Cream 13 oz (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Nair Men Hair Remover Body Cream is quick & easy. Works while you shower. For clean looking smooth skin and lasts days longer than shaving. Not for use on head or face.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
